name: Acupressure Mat and Pillow Set with Carry Bag, Linen Cotton Mat with HIPS Spikes for Comfort and Wellness
short_description: 𝐅𝐮𝐥𝐥 𝐁𝐨𝐝𝐲 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭: Designed to provide a calming session through natural pressure point stimulation, this acupressure mat and pillow set helps your body relax with added comfort. Ideal for a full body relaxation routine.

𝐃𝐚𝐢𝐥𝐲 𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬: Use the acupressure mat for 20–30 minutes, 1–2 times per day, to support your daily wellness habits. Initial use may feel intense, but the sensation becomes more comfortable over time. Wearing a light T-shirt can enhance comfort.

𝐃𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬: Crafted from 55% linen and 45% cotton, with coconut palm fiber filling in the mat and cork particles in the pillow. Hot pressed spikes (glue free) provide consistent pressure and durability.
𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐋𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐝: Mat: 29.5 × 16.5 × 1 inches, Pillow: 15.7 × 11.8 inches Lightweight, portable, and built for everyday full body sessions.

𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 & 𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲: Includes a lightweight carry bag for storage or travel. Packaged individually with a neutral instruction manual. Hand wash only; avoid hot water and direct sunlight to preserve the HIPS spikes.

name: Premium Portable + Comfortable Acupressure Lumbar Cushion Pillow, 2,142 Acupuncture Pressure Points, Neck Pain Relief, Increased Energy, Relaxation, Drawstring Bag, 15x6x4", Purple
short_description: ACUPRESSURE PILLOW: Acubliss is designed with 2142 premium nails and uses 42 non-toxic nails on each plate (rather than 25 like most other mats) stimulating more pressure points with less intensity, providing more benefits and less pain

ACUBLISS BENEFITS: Our acupuncture lumbar cushion pillow does not penetrate the skin, but instead supports relaxation, meditation, deep sleep, stress, muscle tension, upper and lower back pain, plantar fasciitis, and more, as the body restores natural vitality, making this a great addition to your beauty tools arsenal. The pillow can also be used to target treatment zones, tension headaches, migraines, reflexology zone therapy for feet, or as a lumbar support for head, neck and back

EASY TO USE: Just lie down on or against our comfortable accupressure pillow for at least 10 minutes and hello euphoria! As trigger points massage your skin, they stimulate oxytocin for calmness and ‘happiness’ endorphins that block pain and ease insomnia or restlessness. The cushion is great for travel and can be used for yoga, at the gym, in bed, on the sofa, at home or at the office for head to toe therapy treatment

PLANET FRIENDLY: All our products use 100% non-toxic, recyclable HIPS plastic and are secured to the PU foam-filled 100% cotton fabric with a melting process (no environmentally damaging glue) Size 15x6x4”

AFFORDABLE GIFT GIVING: We turned the ancient sadhu board into a global acupressure mats movement! We offer a generous 60-day return policy on our acupuncture mat products because we take pride in full customer satisfaction. Available in blue or purple and several size options (mat, strap, round pillow or bundles). Makes a perfect gift for Christmas, Easter, Birthday or Holiday

name: Gaiam Acupressure Mat and Pillow Set, Acupuncture Style Massage Mat & Pillow, Relief for Sciatic Nerve, Muscle Tension, Fibromyalgia, Neck, Shoulder & Back Pain, Migraine & Headaches and Insomnia Grey
short_description: ACUPRESSURE MAT AND PILLOW SET: This acupuncture style mat and neck pillow will help you find the joy in a little bit of pain. This will hurt so good while providing valuable restorative benefits without the high costs of a doctor’s visit

STIMULATES HEALING: Thousands of pressure point nodes work to increase circulation and blood flow to stimulated areas, helping to aid in back and neck pain relief, relaxation, easing stress and reducing tension and inflammation throughout the body

HOW IT WORKS: By applying pressure against the body, a series of small points work to simulate acupuncture style therapy - when pressure points in the body are stimulated, blood flows to the affected areas to promote pain relief, healing and relaxation

A FEW MINUTES A DAY: Start by applying light pressure on the mat against a chair or couch for 10-15 minutes, while intermediate and advanced users should begin to apply direct pressure by laying on the mat and pillow shirtless for 15-30 minutes a day

MULTI-PURPOSE: This set is great for treating many ailments including headaches and migraines, insomnia, fibromyalgia, reflexology, and overall tension and nerve pain relief. The pillow and mat set is easy to spot clean with a damp towel and mild soap

short_description: ✔ BRAND QUALITY: The #DoYourFitness acupressure mats and pillows are based on classical Chinese tradition. They stimulate countless acupressure points on the skin simultaneously. The mat is also suitable for the stimulation of the foot reflex zones

✔ MODE OF ACTION: The bodyweight is completely evenly distributed on top of the nail tips. All in all, there are 230 nail pads with overall 6210 pyramid-thorns on the mat. Already after a short period of time you can feel a pleasant warmth spreading through your whole body. Ideal for relaxation and meditation.

✔ ACUPRESSURE: Acupressure is the regenerative massage application by stimulation of certain acupressure resp. trigger points and energy zones according to Chinese tradition. The feeling of a pleasant warmth helps you forget the stress and strain of the day. Physical and mental problems are a thing of the past. Ideal for everybody, who wants to save themselves the trip to the massage parlour and relax in the comfort of their own home.

✔ MEASUREMENTS: L 66 cm x W 40 cm x H 2 cm, pillow: L 38 cm x D 16 cm x H 10 cm. Mat and pillow can be easily and comfortably stored for transport in the acupressure bag. The material consists of 100% cotton and is washable. Just take out the foam core and it is ready for washing. But caution: The acupressure mat should always be washed separately, because the plastic tips could damage other textiles.

✔ MEDITATION: Tranquility and inner balance can easily be lost in everyday life. Meditation can help, to escape the hustle and bustle, to be just there for ourselves and come to rest. Acupressure contributes to relax and enhance the meditative effect. A thought-out concept, high-quality processing, durable material as well as attractive colours and designs make our acupressure set the number one choice when it comes to relaxation, regeneration and meditation.

short_description: RELIEF FOR YOUR BODY ACHES: Thousands of spikes are precisely located on the padded acupuncture needles mat to gently press into your back, neck and head. Lying on the long deep tissue massager mat for 10-30 minutes a day releases the tension in your muscles and aids your body in its vital healing. This serenity sleep induction mat is the best aid to cure insomnia.

RELAXATION & STRESS RELIEF – Lay back and relax onto this “bed of needles” to massage pressure points that help release tight muscles and relieve stress. Use prior to bedtime to improve your rest and reduce insomnia.

FULL BODY MASSAGE & SUPPORT - The cushioned foam mat is large enough to cover your full back, as well as your shoulder, waist or neck. Unlike many mats that only provide back massage, our set also includes a pillow covered in acute-pressure points for neck support and more holistic pain relief. Besides back, neck, shoulder and waist, you can also place the acupressure pad under your stomach, chest, face, hip, leg, foot and other positions for a full body massage.

INCREASED ENERGY & CIRCULATION - Besides naturally reducing muscle tension, back pain, and headaches, there are many other incredible health effects after using the mat for 10-40 minutes a day, such as enhancing blood circulation, improving sleeping quality, increasing energy levels.

HIGH QUALITY - The spiked outer cover of the acupuncture mat is made of thick cotton, while the soft inner is plant-based eco foam. The acupressure mat has over 6,000 acupressure points and neck pillow has about 1,700 acupressure points to provide deep pinpoint stimulation.

Lying on the long mat for 10-30 minutes a day releases the tension in your muscles and aids your body in its vital healing. You may start using it for 10 minutes the first few times and increase the time slowly (no longer than 45 minutes). Make sure you don't fall asleep on the mat. TOP NOTCH QUALITY: The stimulation points are made with high quality non toxic abs plastic that will not cause allergic reactions. The soft foam mat is covered with 100% high quality cotton material.
